segments.text: I'm standing here, just watching this whole scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink seems so focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water pouring over the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a continuous sheet, just gushing onto the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely unaware of their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical in a way, if it weren't so concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That poor kitchen is going to be soaked, imagine the water damage!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor must be getting really slippery now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just keeps polishing that plate, completely oblivious to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the drain isn't taking anything away; the sink is truly overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This calm demeanor while disaster unfolds is truly baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR
